definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
confused/dizzy/giddy/to faint/to swoon/to lose consciousness/to pass out
to faint with blurred vision (idiom); dizzy and eyes dimmed
variant of 頭暈腦脹|头晕脑胀[tou2 yun1 nao3 zhang4]

sentences.english: In a moment, you'll begin to feel light-headed, then drowsy.
sentences.chinese: 马上，你会开始感到头晕，然后昏昏欲睡。

sentences.english: His vision blurred and a wave of dizziness washed over him.
sentences.chinese: 他的视线模糊了，一阵头晕目眩冲击着他。

sentences.english: Mount Everest reaches the dizzy height of 8848 meters.
sentences.chinese: 珠穆朗玛峰8848米的高度让人觉得头晕目眩。

sentences.english: Often appear these days giddy and disgusting, this kind of symptom is discontinuity .
sentences.chinese: 最近几天老是出现头晕恶心，这种症状是间断性的。

sentences.english: I'm still feeling a little woozy, so I rest my head on his shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 我仍然感到有点头晕，所以我把头靠在他的肩上。

sentences.english: She always feels faint at the sight of blood.
I can't stand the smell of petrol and always become dizzy in a car.
sentences.chinese: 我受不了汽油味，每次坐车都觉得头晕。

sentences.english: The heaving of the ship made her dizzy and she leanedagainst the handrail.
sentences.chinese: 轮船的起伏让她头晕眼花，她斜靠在扶手上。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate whether vertebrobasilar dolichoectasia has relation with dizziness.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究基底动脉极度过长弯曲是否与头晕有关。

sentences.english: When I stood up, I felt lightheaded but not dizzy.
sentences.chinese: 当我站起来时，觉得有点轻飘飘的，但并不会头晕。

sentences.english: The dervish es whirl around and around without getting dizzy.
sentences.chinese: 苦修僧人反复旋转而不感到头晕。

sentences.english: Last October, Nathan Schram was giddy with anticipation.
sentences.chinese: 去年十月，弥敦道施拉姆是与预期头晕。

sentences.english: Garret dropped into the water and had a blank moment of dizziness.
sentences.chinese: 盖瑞特掉进了水里，一时头晕目眩。

sentences.english: His dizzy revery lasted all night long.
sentences.chinese: 他经过了一整夜的头晕目眩的苦思。

sentences.english: The Regent broke the connection and Edwards sat there, his head swimming.
sentences.chinese: 瑞金特切断了连线，爱德华兹坐在那里，头晕目眩。

definition: to faint with blurred vision (idiom); dizzy and eyes dimmed
variant of 腦脹|脑胀[nao3 zhang4]
to faint with blurred vision (idiom); dizzy and eyes dimmed
variant of 頭昏腦脹|头昏脑胀[tou2 hun1 nao3 zhang4]
